keyMoments.title: Franky's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Franky makes his first appearance in the series, shown at the Franky House headquarters with his family celebrating their theft of the Straw Hats' money.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Franky as an antagonist who will eventually become the Straw Hat Pirates' shipwright.

keyMoments.title: Celebrating with Stolen Money
keyMoments.description: Franky and his family celebrate after stealing 200 million berries from the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Franky's carefree, party-loving nature and sets him up as an antagonist.

relationships.description: Franky's family attacked Usopp and stole the Straw Hats' money, making them enemies.

evolutionMoments.description: Franky's family beats up Usopp and steals 200 million berries.

reveals.information: Leader of the Franky Family, a gang of ship dismantlers in Water 7
Flamboyant and eccentric personality with signature 'SUPER!' catchphrase

keyMoments.title: Usopp Beaten by Franky Family
keyMoments.description: Usopp is found beaten and injured on a Water 7 street after being attacked by the Franky Family. He has black eyes, a bent nose, and a missing tooth.
keyMoments.significance: This brutal beating triggers Usopp's feelings of inadequacy and worthlessness, which will escalate into his conflict with Luffy.
keyMoments.quote: I'm sorry... I couldn't protect the money... It's all my fault...

keyMoments.title: Decides to Confront Franky Family Alone
keyMoments.description: Despite his severe injuries, Usopp decides to go to the Franky House alone to retrieve the stolen money.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Usopp's determination and sense of responsibility, even when outmatched.
keyMoments.quote: I have to get that money back... It was my responsibility...

keyMoments.title: Destroys Franky House Door
keyMoments.description: Usopp arrives at Franky House and uses his slingshot to destroy the front door, confronting the Franky Family to get the money back.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Usopp's courage despite being injured and outmatched.

relationships.description: Usopp was beaten and robbed by the Franky Family, making them enemies.

evolutionMoments.description: The Franky Family attacks Usopp and steals the crew's money.

reveals.information: Usopp feels deep guilt and responsibility for failing to protect the 200 million berries
Despite being severely beaten and outmatched, Usopp's pride drives him to confront his attackers alone

keyMoments.title: Zambai's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Zambai appears as the right-hand man of the Franky Family, celebrating the stolen money with the gang.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Zambai as a prominent member of the Franky Family.

relationships.description: Zambai is Franky's right-hand man and loyal subordinate.

evolutionMoments.description: Zambai is introduced as Franky's right-hand man.

reveals.information: Right-hand man of the Franky Family

keyMoments.title: Kiwi's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Kiwi appears as one of the Square Sisters, part of the Franky Family celebrating the stolen money.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Kiwi as a member of the Franky Family.

relationships.description: Kiwi and Mozu are known as the Square Sisters due to their square-like hairstyles.

evolutionMoments.description: Kiwi and Mozu appear together as the Square Sisters.

relationships.description: Kiwi is loyal to Franky and follows him like a cheerleader.

evolutionMoments.description: Kiwi is introduced as a loyal member of the Franky Family.

reveals.information: One of the Square Sisters in the Franky Family

keyMoments.title: Mozu's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Mozu appears as one of the Square Sisters, part of the Franky Family celebrating the stolen money.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Mozu as a member of the Franky Family.

relationships.description: Mozu and Kiwi are known as the Square Sisters due to their square-like hairstyles.

evolutionMoments.description: Mozu and Kiwi appear together as the Square Sisters.

relationships.description: Mozu is loyal to Franky and follows him like a cheerleader.

evolutionMoments.description: Mozu is introduced as a loyal member of the Franky Family.

reveals.information: One of the Square Sisters in the Franky Family
